name: Will Glow the Wisp (itch)
description:
Will Glow the Wisp is the first melee bullet hell platformer without platforms, with unique particle based visuals and movement mechanics.

Escape from a magical prison Survive bullet hell Beat the developer

You are able to play against the Developer in Will Glow the Wisp, but only the best players will be able to handle this challenge. Do you want to give it a try?

Features
  • Beautiful handcrafted levels
  • Play vs. another players recordings
  • Beat the Developer
  • Global Highscore
  • Lots of Particles and Bullets
